trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lake Mary
There were no other sightings in Lake Mary on or around August 15th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsI was about 3 miles away from home,riding my bike along the road because theirwere no cars whatsoever.I was using a 5 mile range walkie talkie to talk to mymom,eveything was going so good util I got a static-like interference,I couldntcall,speak,I just absolutely could not do anything I was scared.Suddenly a bigglowing object appeared I said oh great, as the hovering unknown craftapproached I heard a unintelligable ancient-like chant and all of a sudden Ifelt a deep calmness after the wierd chant all I could think of was aliens areyou going to harm meThen another interuption came in,but this time it was acocky soundin guy,the large triangle had little blue looking men.Then a wholerow of tall greys and then two angry looking lizard-like beings,they were verybuilt standing on two legs with devices in their grasp but then I heard ahelicopter coming then suddenly the beings did a slow 360 degree turn into theirship and peered outside the huge, huge window and blasted off over a house thenturned upward and went into space.Then a militaryhelicopter appeared and the man said to me over the walkie talkie are you o.k Isaid yes,then I replied there was a UFO that just took off with a huge roar Theman started to laugh and he said thats what they all say it was only our fighterjet the F-117 GoldStreakWhere did you here about them UFOsThen the militaryhelicopter flew and then a older lady stepped out of her house and said what inthe world was that roaring noise that came from over my houseI said that was notfrom this world it was from up thereAs I pointed at the sky of stars where theextraterrestreial object used to be the lady chuckled as she shut her door.ThenI started to levitate off the ground for about 2 14 of a mile but my w
